title: Pallu
html: PALLU(Palʹlu) [shortened form of Pelaiah, meaning “Jah Has Acted Wonderfully”].Second-named son of Jacob’s firstborn Reuben. (Ge 46:9; 1Ch 5:3) Pallu founded the family of Palluites in the tribe of Reuben. (Ex 6:14; Nu 26:5) He is possibly the same son of Reuben called Peleth at Numbers 16:1.
